db

Class DatabaseUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • db.DatabaseUtil

  • public class DatabaseUtil
extends java.lang.Object
    Utility class for database access, managing JPA persistence and data access including insertion and deletion of records
    Author:
    Peter Hayes, Iain Ritchie

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private javax.persistence.EntityManager em

      private static java.lang.String PERSISTENCE_UNIT_NAME 

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      DatabaseUtil()
      Creates EntityManagerFactory for the given persistence unit and creates an EntityManager based on this
